question: Dr. Patel is looking for a house that will not go beyond her $300,000 budget. She saw a property that has a selling price of $290,000. On top of that, the buyer has to pay a brokerage fee which is 7% of the selling price, and also the transfer fee that is 10% of the selling price. How much more is the total price of the house than Dr. Patel's budget?
